Package pacman

Class Map

java.lang.Object
pacman.Map
public class Map extends Object
The Map class represents the game map for Pacman. It contains methods to load the map from a file, draw the map on the screen, and perform various checks on the map.

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map(String filePath)
      Constructs a Map object with the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file containing the map data

  • Method Details

    • completeCheck

      public boolean completeCheck()
      Checks if the map is completely cleared of points.
      Returns:
      true if the map is completely cleared, false otherwise

    • checkSquare

      public boolean checkSquare(Entity entity)
      Checks if the specified entity can move into the given square on the map. If the square contains a point, it updates the map and sets the 'point' flag to true.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be moved
      Returns:
      true if the entity can move into the square, false otherwise

    • loadMapFromFile

      public int[][] loadMapFromFile(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads the map data from the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file containing the map data
      Returns:
      a 2D array representing the pixels of the map
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the file

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d, int BLOCK_SIZE)
      Draws the map on the specified graphics context using the given block size.
      Parameters:
      g2d - the graphics context to draw on
      BLOCK_SIZE - the size of each block in pixels
